discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment: Hi @CohenCyril, could you be the assignee of this PR?

discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment:
Thanks @CohenCyril ! so I've just updated the wiki accordingly:
https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/wiki/How-to-add-overlays-for-PRs

commits.author: erikmd
commits.message:
fix: Add missing "except: schedules"

It seems adding an "except:" rule in a job that "extends:" another one
*overwrites* the except rule, so we were getting too many jobs in the
mathcomp-dev scheduled pipeline.

Once merged, this patch should fix this.
